name: Achievement Hunter: Overdose
description:
Achievement Hunter: Overdose is a 2d action/shooter in which you've got to hold the line against bunch of monsters coming from faraway galaxy.
In this game you'll discover a lot of violence, brutal enemies, charismatic heroes and a lot of action.
Incinerate all the adversaries in the name of A***h!


Features:

- Minimum allowable price
- 5000 Achievements
- Charismatic heroes and a lot of action
- Brutal enemies
- Lot of violence
